pkgmetadata.longdescription: Extensible Bootstrapped Split-Half Reliabilities // Calculates scores and estimates bootstrapped split-half reliabilities for reaction time tasks and questionnaires. The 'splithalfr' can be extended with custom scoring algorithms for user-provided datasets. For more information, see Parsons, Kruijt, Fox (2018) doi:10.31234/osf.io/6ka9z.
